# Raspberry Pi 5 Boot Firmware
# Download from official Raspberry Pi firmware repository
# https://github.com/raspberrypi/firmware

# Required files:
# - start4.elf - GPU firmware
# - fixup4.dat - GPU firmware fixup data
# - bcm2712-rpi-5-b.dtb - Device tree binary

# These files are required for booting the Pi 5
# Download from the Raspberry Pi firmware repository and place here
